title: Why can't I use "Diablo" in my status?
body: Was trying to make my status "Playing Diablo 3". However I was unable to because "**OOPS** The status contains one or more offensive words. Please remove the offensive words and try again." My main questions is why is this considered offensive? Now I may just be a dunce and not understand why I am not allowed to have "Diablo" in my status, but can put "Playing Spanish Devil 3."

replies.body: Spanish Devil 3 isn't too bad actually, might have been a better name for it considering how much they ruined the Diablo series with their followup game.
Obviously RIOT is offended that you're playing another game and like a jealous woman won't let you even tell people.

Just tested this and you're correct, it's listed as an offensive word. I can't provide a direct answer as to why this specific word is considered *offensive* but I know that a lot of the words that are filtered in the client have been considered *offensive* by the community.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
This ins't the only word like that. words like "chaotic" are also marked. This is one of the problems with using automatic systems.
...How about you just notice this is an issue and fix it?
